results.logicSynthesis.logic.truthtable

Class State<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.CObject
      • results.logicSynthesis.logic.truthtable.State<T>

  • public class State<T>
extends common.CObject
    The State class contains a state of a netlist used within the SimulatedAnnealing algorithm class of the technologyMapping stage.
    Author:
    Vincent Mirian
    Date:
    Today

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      State(java.util.List<T> nodes, java.lang.Boolean One, java.lang.Boolean Zero)
      Initializes a newly created State with the list of types defined by parameter nodes the True value defined by parameter One, the false value defined by parameter Zero.
      State(java.util.List<T> nodes, java.lang.Boolean One, java.lang.Boolean Zero, int value)
      Initializes a newly created State with the list of types defined by parameter nodes the True value defined by parameter One, the false value defined by parameter Zero, and value defined by parameter value.
